content.source_2: Milford Township, Defiance County, Ohio Milford Township is one of the twelve townships of Defiance County, Ohio, United States. The 2010 census found 1,081 people in the township. Located in the northwestern corner of the county along the Indiana line, it borders the following townships: No municipalities are located in Milford Township. Milford Township was established in 1837. Statewide, other Milford Townships are located in Butler and Knox counties.
